headline: Brown & Brown Enters Into Accelerated Share Repurchase Program With Bank Of America For $250M Of Its Common Stock
summary: Brown & Brown, Inc. (NYSE:BRO) (the "Company") today announced that it has entered into an accelerated share repurchase program (ASR) with Bank of America, N.A. for $250 million of the Company's common stock. The ASR
